Types

Connection = ref object of RootObj
  open_fut: Future[void]
  closed_fut: Future[void]
  parent: Option[Connection]

  conn*: Connection
  child: Option[T]

proc newConnection(): Connection {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
proc onOpen(conn: Connection): Future[void] {...}{.inline, raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns a future that completes when this Connection is ready for use. 
proc hasOpened(conn: Connection): bool {...}{.inline, raises: [], tags: [].}
True if this Connection has ever been open (so it remains true even after the Connection is closed) 
proc open(conn: Connection) {...}{.raises: [FutureError, Exception], tags: [RootEffect].}
Indicate that this connection is open to send and receive data. 
proc isClosed(conn: Connection): bool {...}{.inline, raises: [], tags: [].}
proc close(conn: Connection) {...}{.raises: [FutureError, Exception, UnpackError],
                            tags: [RootEffect].}
proc onClose(conn: Connection): Future[void] {...}{.inline, raises: [], tags: [].}
proc follow(child: Connection; parent: var Connection; followOpen = true;
           followClose = true) {...}{.raises: [Exception, FutureError, UnpackError],
                              tags: [RootEffect].}

Make a child Connection follow a parent Connection

If followOpen is true (default), the child will open when the parent does otherwise, the child will not open when the parent does.

If followClose is true (default), the child will close when the parent closes. otherwise, the child will not close automatically when the parent closes.
